title: How to report outside of game.
body: If I'm looking to submit a report against a player and include the screenshot. How do I go about doing so? I went to submit a ticket, but I can't see an option to "report a player" anymore.

replies.body: The reporting tool on the post-game screen helps us prioritize who is looked at, and any additional information that's provided in the text field is super helpful.  Though that's the preferred method, you can submit a ticket through the method that Rineyy provided.  Thanks for helping to keep the community fun and fair!

Contact Riot’s [Player Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category has already been selected. 

* For the secondary category, choose **Game & Features**

* Under the tertiary category, choose **General Questions**

Use these categories whenever you'd like to report players. Ensure to attach those screenshots as well!
